isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RT-6613 SERIES - REMOVE

step1.para: Disconnect the two 1/8 inch O.D. countershaft brake control air lines at the control valve ( Figure 13).

figure.caption: Figure 13. Disconnect Countershaft Brake Control Air Lines

step1.para: Loosen the clamp and remove the countershaft brake control valve from the shifting lever ( Figure 14 ).

figure.caption: Figure 14. Remove Countershaft Brake Control Valve

step1.para: Disconnect the 1/8 inch O.D. air line at the TCB-6 brake on the right side PTO opening ( Figure 15).

figure.caption: Figure 15. Disconnect Air Line at TCB-6 Brake

step1.para: Disconnect the 1/8 inch O.D. air line at the tee block fitting between the air filter and regulator ( Figure 16).

figure.caption: Figure 16. Disconnect Air Line at Tee Block Fitting

step1.para: Disconnect the black 1/8 inch O.D. signal line at the rear "P" port of the slave valve ( Figure 17).

figure.caption: Figure 17. Disconnect Signal Line at "P" Port

step1.para: Disconnect the white 1/8 inch O.D. supply line at the forward "S" port of the slave valve ( Figure 18).

figure.caption: Figure 18. Disconnect Supply Line at "S" Port

step1.para: Disconnect the black 1/8 inch O.D. signal line at the intermediate shift cylinder ( Figure 19).

figure.caption: Figure 19. Disconnect Signal Line at Intermediate Shift Cylinder

step1.para: Disconnect the three 1/8 inch O.D. air lines at the selector valve ( Figure 20).

figure.caption: Figure 20. Disconnect Air Lines at Selector Valve

step1.para: Loosen the jam nut and turn the nut and selector valve from the shifting lever ( Figure 21). Remove the air lines, sheathing and O-rings from the lever

figure.caption: Figure 21. Turn Nut and Selector Valve From Shifting Lever

step1.para: Remove the 1/4 inch I.D. air line between the slave valve and the air filter/regulator assembly ( Figure 22).

figure.caption: Figure 22. Remove Air Line Between Slave Valve and Air Filter/Regulator Assembly

step1.para: Remove the 1/4 inch I.D. air line between the slave valve and the low range port of the auxiliary shift cylinder ( Figure 23).

figure.caption: Figure 23. Remove Air Line Between Slave Valve and Low Range Port

step1.para: Remove the 1/4 inch I.D. air line between the slave valve and the direct range port of the auxiliary shift cylinder ( Figure 24).

figure.caption: Figure 24. Remove Air Line Between Slave Valve and Direct Range Port

step1.para: Remove the 1/4 inch I.D. air line between the air filter/regulator assembly and the intermediate shift cylinder ( Figure 25).

figure.caption: Figure 25. Remove Air Line Between Air Filter/Regulator Assembly and Intermediate Shift Cylinder

step1.para: Remove the two bolts and the air filter/regulator assembly ( Figure 26).

figure.caption: Figure 26. Remove Bolts and Air Filter/Regulator Assembly

step1.para: Remove the four retaining bolts and the slave valve from the transmission ( Figure 27).

figure.caption: Figure 27. Remove Retaining Bolts and Slave Valve

step1.para: Remove the hat-type sleeve from the bore in the valve ( Figure 28).
Remove the spring and plunger from the transmission bore ( Figure 29).
